Victor Functions¶

victor_functions¶

class victor_functions.datasets.Storm_Dataset(root, test_size=0.2, seed=42, split_method='random', split='none')¶

Bases: Dataset

A custom dataset class for loading image data along with their associated labels and features.

This class is designed to load data from a specified directory, handling images and their associated label and feature files. It splits the data into training and test sets and supports basic transformations.

root¶

The root directory from which the data is loaded.

Type:

str

data¶

List of tuples containing paths to images and their

Type:

list

associated labels and features.
train_data¶

List of training data samples.

Type:

list

test_data¶

List of test data samples.

Type:

list

Parameters:

  • root (str) – The directory path from where to load the data.

  • test_size (float, optional) – Proportion of the dataset to include in

  • 0.2. (the test split. Defaults to) –

  • seed (int, optional) – Random seed for splitting the dataset.

  • 42. (Defaults to) –

victor_functions.datasets.set_seed(seed)¶

Use this to set ALL the random seeds to a fixed value and take out any randomness from cuda kernels
